entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
